snippet: Mikhail Guryevskiy has struggled with hardships in Ukraine, the death of his mother and many other ups-and-downs. But last year was one of the worst of his life.
abstract: Marks JCH, beneficiary agency of UJA-Federation of New York, one of the organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, draws $300 to help Mikhail Guryevskiy pay his rent.
lead_paragraph: Mikhail Guryevskiy has struggled with hardships in Ukraine, the death of his mother and many other ups-and-downs. But last year was one of the worst of his life.

headline.print_headline: After Losing His Mother and His Health, a Man Takes Shaky Steps to Recovery
headline.main: After Losing His Mother and His Health, a Man Takes Shaky Steps to Recovery
